page.title: 07Gorran = Recreation
page.content: Recreation is varied,catering for a variety of tastes.Boating comes high on the list in summer,when the beach and harbour are full of pleasure craft Everybody takes advantage of the safe bathing;water-skiing and skin diving are very popular pasttimes - as is fishing,from boat,beach,rock,or harbour quay.Many walkers use the scenic coastal footpath.The village cricket club,soon to celebrate its centenary,and building a new pavilion,has one of the best squares in the county,and runs two teams in the East Cornwall League,plus a flourishing youth team.Indoor activities include Old Time Dancing,Whist Drives,Keep Fit,Yoga,a painting club,a Retirement Club,and a busy Women's Institute.The Snooker Club plays weekly matches in the Roseland,and St. Blazey,Leagues.
